sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentState=#currentState#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND (currentState="0" OR currentState="1")
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#userId# AND (currentState="0" OR currentState="1")
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE currentState="0" AND tableId = #tableId# AND groupId IN (SELECT groupId FROM t_group_user WHERE userId = #userId#) limit 1;
select * from t_group_table where keyId=#keyId#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE configId=#configId# AND currentState="0" AND currentCount< maxCount AND createdTime>= #myDate# LIMIT 1

/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE serverId = #serverId# AND configId = #configId# AND currentState = "0" AND currentCount < maxCount AND createdTime >= #myDate# AND isPrivate = 0 LIMIT 1

/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND configId = #configId# AND currentState = "0" AND currentCount < maxCount AND tableMsg NOT LIKE '%"props":"0%' AND isPrivate = 0 ORDER BY currentCount DESC LIMIT 1
select * from t_group where groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupState="1"
select * from t_group where isCredit = 1 ORDER BY isCreditUpTime desc limit #indexBegin#,10;
select * from t_group where isCredit = 1 and groupId=#groupId# ORDER BY isCreditUpTime desc limit #indexBegin#,10;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group set isCredit = #credit# ,isCreditUpTime=#isCreditUpTime# WHERE groupId=#groupId#
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentState=#currentState#

(SELECT groupId,groupName FROM t_group WHERE groupState="1" AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupId<= #groupRoom# ORDER BY groupId DESC LIMIT 2) UNION (SELECT groupId,groupName FROM t_group WHERE groupState="1" AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupId> #groupRoom# ORDER BY groupId ASC LIMIT 2)
select * from t_group where keyId=#keyId# AND groupState="1"

select * from t_group_user where userId=#userId#
groupId=#groupId#
limit 1
select * from t_group_user where userRole=1 AND groupId=#groupId# limit 1
select * from t_group_user where userRole=10000 AND groupId=#groupId# AND userId = (select $promoterId$ from t_group_user where userId = #userId# and groupId = #groupId#) limit 1
select * from t_group_user where userRole="0" AND groupId=#groupId# limit 1
select userId from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_group_table (groupId,configId,tableId,tableName,tableMsg,serverId,createdTime,currentState,currentCount,maxCount,userId,type,creditMsg,playType,payMsg,isPrivate,goldMsg) VALUES (#groupId#,#configId#,#tableId#,#tableName#,#tableMsg#,#serverId#,#createdTime#,#currentState#,#currentCount#,#maxCount#,#userId#,#type#,#creditMsg#,#playType#,#payMsg#,#isPrivate#,#goldMsg#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE t_group_table
currentState=#currentState#
currentCount=currentCount+#count#
currentCount=#currentCount#
playedBureau=#playedBureau#
players=#players#
WHERE keyId=#keyId#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ WHERE tableNo=#tableNo# AND userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE keyId=#keyId#
SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1" AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupId=#groupId# ORDER BY keyId DESC limit 1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE t_group_table_config
tableName=#tableName#
tableMode=#tableMode#
modeMsg=#modeMsg#
gameType=#gameType#
payType=#payType#
gameCount=#gameCount#
playerCount=#playerCount#
descMsg=#descMsg#
tableOrder=#tableOrder#
playCount=#playCount#
playCount=playCount+#count#
WHERE keyId =#keyId#

UPDATE t_group_user
groupName=#groupName#
userNickname=#userNickname#
userLevel=#userLevel#
playCount1=#playCount1#
playCount2=#playCount2#
playCount1=playCount1+#count1#
playCount2=playCount2+#count2#
userRole=#userRole#
exp = #exp#
totalExp = #totalExp#
WHERE
keyId=#keyId#
groupId=#groupId#
userId=#userId#

UPDATE t_table_user$gpSeq$ SET playResult=#playResult#, isWinner=#isWinner#, winLoseCredit=#winLoseCredit#, commissionCredit=#commissionCredit#, userGroup=#userGroup#, createdTime=#createdTime# WHERE tableNo=#tableNo# AND userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1" AND groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# ORDER BY keyId DESC limit 1;

select * from t_group_table where (tableMsg not like '%"room":%') and (currentState='0'
or currentState='1'
) and groupId=#groupId#
AND currentCount < maxCount
ORDER BY currentState DESC,currentCount DESC ,keyId ASC limit #startNo#,#pageSize#

select t1.* from t_group_table t1,t_group_table_config t2 where t2.groupId=#groupRoom# AND t1.configId=t2.keyId AND t2.parentGroup=#groupId# AND ( t1.currentState="0"
or t1.currentState="1"
) AND t1.groupId=#groupId#
AND t1.currentCount < t1.maxCount
ORDER BY t1.currentState DESC,t1.currentCount DESC ,t1.keyId ASC limit #startNo#,#pageSize#

SELECT t1.tableNo, t1.userId, t2.`name` as userName, t2.headimgurl, t2.isOnLine, t2.sex FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, user_inf t2 WHERE t2.userId = t1.userId AND t1.tableNo IN ($tableNos$) ORDER BY t1.tableNo desc;

/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT t1.tableNo, t1.userId, t2.`name` as userName, t2.headimgurl, t2.isOnLine, t2.sex FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, user_inf t2 WHERE t2.userId = t1.userId AND t1.tableNo IN ($tableNos$) ORDER BY t1.tableNo desc;

SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1"
groupId=#groupId#
AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# ORDER BY tableOrder ASC,createdTime desc
SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1" AND groupId = #groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# ORDER BY tableOrder ASC,createdTime desc
SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1" AND groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# ORDER BY createdTime desc limit 1
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_group_match (groupCode,userId,createdTime) VALUES (#groupCode#,#userId#,#createdTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group_match where userId=#userId# limit 1
sqlMap.delete: delete from t_group_match where userId in ($userIds$)
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group_match where groupCode=#groupCode# and userId!=#lockCode# order by keyId asc limit #size#
select COALESCE(count(*),0) from t_group_match where groupCode=#groupCode# and userId!=#lockCode#
sqlMap.update: insert IGNORE into t_group_match (groupCode,userId,createdTime) VALUES ('lock',#userId#,#createdTime#)
sqlMap.select: select COUNT(*) from t_group_table where groupId=#groupId# AND (currentState="0" OR currentState="1")

SELECT u.userId,u.`name`,u.headimgurl,u.playingTableId FROM user_inf u,t_group_user g WHERE u.isOnLine="1" AND u.userId=g.userId AND u.playState="0" AND g.groupId=#groupId# AND g.refuseInvite=1 ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #limit#

SELECT u.userId, u.enterServer FROM t_group_user g, user_inf u WHERE g.groupId = #groupId# AND g.refuseInvite = 1
AND g.userId in ( $userIds$ )
AND u.userId = g.userId AND u.isOnLine = 1 AND u.playState = 0
select COUNT(*) from t_group_user where userId=#userId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_user set credit = credit + #credit# WHERE groupId=#groupId# and userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group where parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupState="1"
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentState=#currentState# AND tableMsg like $tableMsg$
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ ( groupId, optUserId, userId, credit, curCredit, curCreditPurse, type, flag, tableId, promoterId1, promoterId2, promoterId3, promoterId4, promoterId5, promoterId6, promoterId7, promoterId8, promoterId9, promoterId10, roomName, createdTime, groupTableId ) VALUES ( #groupId#, #optUserId#, #userId#, #credit#, (select coalesce(credit,0) from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# and userId=#userId#), (select coalesce(creditPurse,0) from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# and userId=#userId#), #type#, #flag#, #tableId#, #promoterId1#, #promoterId2#, #promoterId3#, #promoterId4#, #promoterId5#, #promoterId6#, #promoterId7#, #promoterId8#, #promoterId9#, #promoterId10#, #roomName#, #createdTime#, #groupTableId# )

insert into t_group (parentGroup,groupId,groupName,maxCount,currentCount,groupLevel,groupMode,extMsg,createdTime,createdUser,descMsg,groupState,modifiedTime) VALUES (#parentGroup#,#groupId#,#groupName#,#maxCount#,#currentCount#,#groupLevel#,#groupMode#,#extMsg#,#createdTime#,#createdUser#,#descMsg#,#groupState#,#modifiedTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId

insert into t_group_table_config (parentGroup,groupId,tableName,tableMode,modeMsg,gameType,payType,gameCount,playerCount,descMsg,tableOrder,playCount,createdTime) VALUES (#parentGroup#,#groupId#,#tableName#,#tableMode#,#modeMsg#,#gameType#,#payType#,#gameCount#,#playerCount#,#descMsg#,#tableOrder#,#playCount#,#createdTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.select: select COUNT(*) from t_group_table where groupId = #groupId# AND configId = #configId# AND currentState = "1"
SELECT * FROM t_group_table WHERE currentState="0" AND userId = #userId# AND groupId = #groupId# AND configId = #configId# ORDER BY createdTime desc limit 1
select * from t_group_relation where keyId = #keyId#
select * from t_group_user where groupId = #groupId# AND userGroup = #teamId# AND userRole = 10 limit 1
select * from t_group_table where keyId = #keyId#
select dealCount from t_group_table where keyId = #keyId#
sqlMap.update: update t_group_table set dealCount = #dealCount# where keyId = #keyId#;
sqlMap.select: select currentState from t_group_table where keyId = #keyId#
select currentCount from t_group_table where keyId = #keyId#

/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_table gt, t_group_table_config con where gt.groupId = #groupId# AND gt.currentState in ( "0" , "1" ) AND con.keyId = gt.configId ORDER BY (case when gt.currentState="0" and gt.currentCount>0 then 10
when gt.currentState="1" then 2 when gt.currentState="0" and gt.currentCount=0 then 1
when gt.currentState="0" and gt.currentCount=0 then 2 when gt.currentState="1" then 1
ELSE 0 END ) DESC, con.tableOrder ASC, con.keyId ASC limit #startNo#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.update: update t_group_table set dealCount = dealCount + 1 where keyId = #keyId#;
INSERT INTO bjd_group_newer_bind (userId, groupId) VALUES (#userId#, #groupId#)
sqlMap.select: select groupId from bjd_group_newer_bind where userId=#userId#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentState=#currentState# AND configId = #configId#
SELECT * FROM t_group_commission_config WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND userId = #userId# AND seq = #seq# limit 1
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND currentState = #currentState# AND configId = #configId# AND currentCount <= 0 AND isPrivate = 0
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_table_user$gpSeq$ SET isNewPlayer = #isNewPlayer# WHERE tableNo = #tableNo# AND userId = #userId#
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_table where keyId=#keyId#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_user where userId = #userId# AND groupId = #groupId# limit 1
sqlMap.update: update t_group_user set exp = exp + #exp#, totalExp = totalExp + #exp# where keyId = #keyId#
update t_group set exp = exp + #exp#, totalExp = totalExp + #exp# where keyId = #keyId#
update t_group_user g , sys_group_user_level_config c set g.level = c.level + 1, g.exp = g.exp - c.exp where g.keyId = #keyId# AND c.level = g.level AND g.exp >= c.exp AND c.exp > 0
update t_group g, sys_group_level_config c set g.level = c.level + 1, g.exp = g.exp - c.exp where g.keyId = #keyId# AND c.level = g.level AND g.exp >= c.exp AND c.exp > 0
sqlMap.insert: insert into log_group_exp (groupId,userId,optUserId,tableId,credit,exp,curLevel,curExp,createdTime) VALUES (#groupId#,#userId#,#optUserId#,#tableId#,#credit#,#exp#,(select coalesce(level,0) from t_group where groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=0),(select coalesce(exp,0) from t_group where groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=0),#createdTime#)

insert into log_group_user_exp (groupId,userId,optUserId,tableId,credit,exp,curLevel,curExp,createdTime) VALUES (#groupId#,#userId#,#optUserId#,#tableId#,#credit#,#exp#,(select coalesce(level,0) from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#userId#),(select coalesce(exp,0) from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#userId#),#createdTime#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE t_group
exp = #exp#
totalExp = #totalExp#
WHERE
keyId=#keyId#
update t_group g, sys_group_level_config c set g.exp = 0, g.totalExp = c.totalExp where g.keyId = #keyId# AND c.level = g.level AND c.exp = 0
update t_group_user gu, sys_group_user_level_config c set gu.exp = 0, gu.totalExp = c.totalExp where gu.keyId = #keyId# AND c.level = gu.level AND c.exp = 0
sqlMap.select: select COALESCE(count(*),0) from t_group_user_reject where groupId = #groupId# AND userIdKeyStr = #userIdKeyStr#
select configId, COUNT(1) as ct from t_group_table where groupId = #groupId# AND currentState = "1" GROUP BY configId
select configId, COUNT(1) as ct from t_group_fake_table GROUP BY configId

SELECT u.userId, u.name, u.headimgurl, u.playingTableId, u.playState, u.isOnLine, g.refuseInvite FROM t_group_user g, user_inf u WHERE g.groupId = #groupId# AND g.userId = #userId# AND u.userId = g.userId ORDER BY g.userId ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT u.userId, u.name, u.headimgurl, u.playingTableId, u.playState, u.isOnLine, g.refuseInvite, f.keyId FROM t_group_user_friend f, t_group_user g, user_inf u WHERE f.groupId = #groupId# AND f.userId1 = #userId# AND g.groupId = #groupId# AND g.userId = f.userId2 AND u.userId = f.userId2 UNION SELECT u.userId, u.name, u.headimgurl, u.playingTableId, u.playState, u.isOnLine, g.refuseInvite, f.keyId FROM t_group_user_friend f, t_group_user g, user_inf u WHERE f.groupId = #groupId# AND f.userId2 = #userId# AND g.groupId = #groupId# AND g.userId = f.userId1 AND u.userId = f.userId1 ) AS d ORDER BY (CASE WHEN d.isOnLine = 1 AND d.playingTableId = 0 THEN 10 WHEN d.isOnLine = 1 AND d.playingTableId > 0 THEN 9 WHEN d.isOnLine = 0 AND d.playingTableId > 0 THEN 8 WHEN d.isOnLine = 0 AND d.playingTableId = 0 THEN 7 ELSE 0 END) DESC LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT COALESCE(count(*),0) FROM t_group_user_friend WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND userIdKeyStr = #userIdKeyStr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM t_group_user_friend WHERE keyId = #keyId# AND groupId = #groupId#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO t_group_user_friend ( groupId, userId1, userId2, createdTime, userIdKeyStr ) VALUES( #groupId#, #userId1#, #userId2#, #createdTime#, #userIdKeyStr# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.select: SELECT u.userId, u.name, u.headimgurl, u.playingTableId FROM t_group_user gu, user_inf u WHERE gu.groupId = #groupId# $andSql$ AND gu.refuseInvite = 1 AND u.userId = gu.userId AND u.isOnLine = 1 AND u.playState = 0 ORDER BY gu.credit desc
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_user set score = score + #score# WHERE groupId = #groupId# and userId = #userId#
UPDATE t_group_user set score = #score# WHERE groupId = #groupId# and userId = #userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT g.groupId, g.groupName, gu.userRole, gu.promoterLevel FROM t_group_user gu , t_group g WHERE gu.userId = #userId# AND g.groupId = gu.groupId AND g.goldRoomSwitch = 1
SELECT * FROM t_group_gold_commission_config WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND userId = #userId# AND seq = #seq# limit 1
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_group_gold_log$gpSeq$ ( groupId, optUserId, userId, gold, type, flag, tableId, promoterId1, promoterId2, promoterId3, promoterId4, promoterId5, promoterId6, promoterId7, promoterId8, promoterId9, promoterId10, roomName, createdTime ) VALUES ( #groupId#, #optUserId#, #userId#, #gold#, #type#, #flag#, #tableId#, #promoterId1#, #promoterId2#, #promoterId3#, #promoterId4#, #promoterId5#, #promoterId6#, #promoterId7#, #promoterId8#, #promoterId9#, #promoterId10#, #roomName#, #createdTime# )
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_user WHERE groupId = #groupId# AND userId in ( $userIdList$)
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_fake_table_headimage where fakeTableId in ($fakeTableIds$);
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select keyId, tableOrder from t_group_table_config where parentGroup = #parentGroup# and configState = 1;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_user SET credit = tempCredit + credit, tempCredit = 0 WHERE userId=#userId#
UPDATE t_group_user set creditPurse = creditPurse + #credit# WHERE groupId=#groupId# and userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from t_group_user_wheel where guId = #guId# limit 1;
sqlMap.update: insert into t_group_user_wheel (guId,groupId,lastCount,wheelCount) values (#guId#,#groupId#,#lastCount#,#wheelCount#) on duplicate key update lastCount=#lastCount#,wheelCount=wheelCount+#wheelCount#
